# Cloudflare SSL by Weslink

Plugin to enable CloudFlare Flexible SSL for Wordpress and to prevent the Redirect Loop

**Contributors:** [weslink](https://profiles.wordpress.org/weslink)<br>
**Tags:** [CloudFlare](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/CloudFlare), [SSL](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/SSL), [redirect loop](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/redirect loop), [HTTPS](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/HTTPS), [Flexible SSL](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/Flexible SSL), [Universal SSL](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/Universal SSL), [CTW](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/CTW), [redirect](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/redirect), [CTW SSL](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/CTW SSL)<br>
**Requires at least:** 3.2.1<br>
**Tested up to:** 4.7.4<br>
**Stable tag:** 1.0.7<br>
**License:** [GPLv3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html)<br>
**Donate link:** https://weslink.de<br>

## Description ##

CloudFlare Flexible SSL needs some tiny Modification to get not into a redirect loop. This Plugins makes your Wordpress Site ready to use Cloudflare SSL and prevents the common SSL infinite loop Problem.

[Wordpress and SSL ](https://weslink.de/blog/).

## Frequently Asked Questions ##

### I actived Flexible SSL and can't get into my WP-Admin to enable this Plugin, what to do?  ###
You have to turn off SSL within Cloudflare. Install the Plugin, and the turn SSL on again at Cloudflare

### What if I use CloudFlare Full SSL ? ###
This Plugin is only needed for the Free SSL Version of Cloudflare: Flexible SSL

### What if I use CloudFlare Strict SSL? ###
This Plugin is only needed for the Free SSL Version of Cloudflare: Flexible SSL


## Installation ##

There are no extra steps needed for the installation just acticate this Plugin and you are ready to go.
